generalFAQs.question: When and where is the event?
generalFAQs.answer: MISSCON 2025 will be held on February 24 to 27, 2025 at The Pinnacle Hotel and Suites, Davao City.

generalFAQs.question: How to get to the venue?
generalFAQs.answer: The venue is located at the Sta. Ana Ave, Poblacion District, Davao City, 8000 Davao del Sur, behind Gaisano Mall Bajada. You may refer to Google Maps for directions or ask assistance from the MISSCON 2025 Technical Working Group.

generalFAQs.question: Who are eligible to attend?
generalFAQs.answer: Students, faculty, and alumni from any MISSCON member organization across Mindanao are eligible to participate in the event.

generalFAQs.question: Is there a dress code?
generalFAQs.answer: The dress codes for each event are included in the program.

generalFAQs.question: When will be the cutoff for the early-bird price?
When will be the end of registration period?
How much is the early-bird price?
How much is the regular price?

sponsorshipFAQs.question: What are the benefits of sponsoring this event?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Sponsoring MISSCON 2025 provides extensive visibility for your brand before, during, and after the event. Your logo will feature prominently on publicity materials, Instagram filters, and official posts. Additionally, sponsors gain opportunities to showcase their products, interact with attendees, and align with a prestigious academic event celebrating international studies and cultural diversity.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: What types of sponsorship opportunities are available?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: MISSCON 2025 offers several sponsorship tiers, including: Major Sponsorship (Co-Presentor): PHP 25,000 Minor Sponsorship Tiers: Diamond (PHP 10,000+), Platinum (PHP 7,000), Gold (PHP 4,000), Silver (PHP 2,000). Each level includes distinct benefits such as logo placement size, acknowledgment frequency, and booth opportunities. Please refer to our Sponsorship Packages for more information.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Can I customize my sponsorship package?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Yes, all sponsorship packages are negotiable to align with your specific goals and preferences.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: How much does sponsorship cost?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Sponsorship costs range from PHP 2,000 (Silver) to PHP 25,000+ (Major Sponsor). Specific tiers provide different benefits, as outlined in the sponsorship letter.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Are there payment plans or installment options?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Payment terms are negotiable. Please contact the event organizers for customized arrangements.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Where will my logo appear as a sponsor?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Your logo placement depends on the sponsorship level, including: Publicity materials, MISSCON Instagram filters, LED wall presentations, Delegation kits, Gratitude postings.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Can I provide promotional materials for attendees?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Yes, promotional materials can be included in the delegation kits or displayed at your booth, depending on the sponsorship level.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Can I display my products or services during the event?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Major sponsors can set up a non-profit booth to showcase products or services. Activities or games promoting your brand can also be organized with prior coordination.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: How many people are expected to attend?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: The event expects participants from multiple schools across Mindanao, with an estimated 100 - 150 participants and a combined social media reach of over 13,000 social media users.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Can I interact directly with attendees?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Yes, sponsors can engage attendees through booths, promotional activities, and during event interactions.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Do sponsors get complimentary tickets or VIP access?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: Details about complimentary tickets or VIP access are negotiable. Contact the organizers for specifics.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: How will I know if the sponsorship is effective?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: The event organizers will include your brand in promotional posts and gratitude postings. You can evaluate engagement through these, as well as interactions at the event.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: What happens if the event is canceled or postponed?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: In such cases, the organizers will communicate updated plans and discuss arrangements to ensure your sponsorship benefits are preserved.

sponsorshipFAQs.question: Who do I contact for more information about sponsorships?
sponsorshipFAQs.answer: For inquiries, contact: Mary Angelica Sedentario: 09493265522 | maasedentario@addu.edu.ph, Diwani Ma. Rosemina Gales: 09678133820 | dmrggales@addu.edu.ph, Organization Email: aisso@addu.edu.ph or misscon2025@gmail.com
